analyses.title: Transaction Volume Analysis
analyses.context: Understanding transaction volumes helps to identify peak sales periods and operational workload trends.

sub_analyses.title: Daily Transaction Volume
sub_analyses.why: To identify daily transaction trends and assess peak operational periods.

sub_analyses.title: Monthly Transaction Volume
sub_analyses.why: To evaluate monthly sales cycles and assess performance relative to historical data.

analyses.title: Item Sales Analysis
analyses.context: This analysis seeks to determine which items are most sold, aiding in inventory and marketing strategies.

sub_analyses.title: Top Selling Items
sub_analyses.why: To identify which items are driving sales volume.
answers: List of items sorted by quantity sold, in descending order.

sub_analyses.title: Average Quantity per Item
sub_analyses.why: To assess average purchase quantity per item category.
answers: Average quantity sold per item type.

analyses.title: Revenue Analysis
analyses.context: Understanding revenue streams through transaction values and item pricing.

sub_analyses.title: Total Revenue by Day
sub_analyses.why: To evaluate daily revenue performance and identify high revenue days.

sub_analyses.title: Average Spend per Transaction
sub_analyses.why: To understand customer spend behavior per transaction.

analyses.title: Payment Method Analysis
analyses.context: This assists in understanding customer payment preferences and streamlining payment processing methods.

sub_analyses.title: Distribution of Payment Methods
sub_analyses.why: To identify which payment methods are most preferred by customers.
answers: Proportion of transactions per payment method.

analyses.title: Location Based Sales Analysis
analyses.context: Analyzing transactions by location to inform geographic sales strategies.

sub_analyses.title: Sales Distribution by Location
sub_analyses.why: To determine sales distribution across different locations.
